properties.name: secured-properties.allowed-algorithm
properties.description: The allowed encryption algorithms for auto-create the secret-key like 'AES_256' or 'DESede_168'.

properties.name: secured-properties.auto-create-secret-key
properties.description: If the secret Key should be created automatically if missing, or an Exception should be shown instead.

properties.name: secured-properties.salt-length
properties.description: The salt length to make sure that properties with the same value result in different encrypted strings.

properties.name: secured-properties.secret-file
properties.description: The place of your secret file. default is '$HOME/.secret/securedProperties.key'.
